content: ANN Pink Elephant Token (PET) Release!!!Click Add Custom Asset On TokenPocket Or Binance Smart Chain Wallet And Add The Address Below To Add It To Your Wallet0x2A60ee84860E9A90025dec1569018862B365019bInstead of Having Air Drops A Large Amount Of The Token Has Been Posted On Sushi Swap For Initial Sale Extreamly Cheap It Sells Permenantly There ForBNBThere Will Be 400,000,000,000 Tokens Released At This Point, Once They Sell I Will Be Posting Again For An Adjustable Price So That Suish SwapIs The Cheapest Place To Buy It!!Until 6 Trillion Tokens Have Been Sold.A Max Supply Of 9,496,496,070,339 PETCheck Out The Token Prices Herehttps://bscscan.com/token/0x2A60ee84860E9A90025dec1569018862B365019bFor The Official Token TrackerExchange Listings Will Be Posted Below In The FutureThee Auction Can Be Found Belowhttps://app.sushi.com/miso/0xeD99dA752eECd3537A7AA8000F845c7746219608?chainId=56You Just Have To Google Sushi Swap And Log In With Your Binance Smart Chain Wallet If The Links BrokenAt The Top Of Sushi Swap Go To MISO and Look For Pink Elephant Token. If You Have Any Other Problems Check To See If The Network Is Set To BSC.************************************************************edit***************************************************************************This Coin Is Not Meant To Be A Stable Coin It Does See Price Fluctuation, The Point Of The Coin Is To Release It Until Final Sales Of Its 6 Trillion Market Sale, Very Very Cheap. Over Roughly 30 Years. We Implement The Liquidity Gained Over Time To Design Its Price, Against Not BNB As Its Sold for on Sushi Swap But Any Other Coin, Probably A Stable Coin Like USDC or USDT.So The Initial Max Supply Sale Is The Stable Part It Will Always Be Sold For 0.000000001 BNB Per Coin Max Otherwise We Adjust The Price As Stated Above, Then The Coin Is Implemented Against Other Coins As Liquidity Where I Set The Price. So That The Coin Sees Huge Inflation On Its Selling Price.Exchanges Are Also Implemented, So That Your End Of The Liquidity Has A Safe Backend For Sale.Only 400,000,000,000 Coins Will Be Implemented A Year On Sushi Swap For You To BuyIf Your New To Binance Smart Chain Network Check Out This Link And Other Stuff On Their WebSite For A Heads Up On All Things Binancehttps://academy.binance.com/en/articles/an-introduction-to-binance-smart-chain-bsc-The Pink Elephant Token:                                             "Remember The Way's Of The Lotus"******************************************************************************************************************************************Oh' A Pink Elephant!!

comments.body: Only 1 Hour and 30 Minutes until release!!Oh' A Pink Elephant!

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Quote from: PinkElephantToken on July 11, 2022, 04:33:49 AMOnly 1 Hour and 30 Minutes until release!!Oh' A Pink Elephant!Ok. Like that would explain everything.  At least try and explain what this project is about or even put the link to the website rather than shouting about how it is currently listed cheap and everyone should buy it.I feel bad for the actual pink elephant out there who has no clue they are being used as part of your propaganda.
